title: Movie Genres: Netflix
description: Demo app for displaying Netflix genres, opens to your account to choose movie based on genre.

title: Voter Map
description: Demo app for capturing live votes based on geo data in a clickable map with real time chart update.

title: Music Studio
description: Music studio management app allows Teachers and Students to track of assigned Resources in a music Lesson with Resources in PDF, Audio and Video

title: Cooler Communities
description: Demo app for tracking carbon emission reduction for a community.

title: Pool Service Management
description: Demo app for tracking pool service business with two retails locations and seven service trucks.
